fields.headline: The white house
fields.bodyText: Marta, the owner of Koala Tarifa used to run a local design shop in the hip Spanish seaside resort, but turned her creative eye to restoring a 300-year old white Andaluz townhouse in Tarifa's old town. It's now a collection of hip Spanish seaside resort around a central patio, with airy rooms decorated with black and white art, glass-topped tables and lime sofas. She and her husband Bjorn can offer advice on the best swimming and kite-surfing spots, bars and boutiques. · From €80 for a double per night or €140 for an apartment (sleeps four), including breakfast. 00 34 956 682 255, koalatarifa.es.
